column4: so hows the reception to unity been these days? haven't tried it since 11.04
hmm, guess i'll install virtualbox and put it in VM and test it myself
just curious to try it, ubuntu has still seemed to keep its popularity, whether it be marketing or just a good product
i doubt unity/gnome3 is going to work "very" well in VBox - it'll work (assuming 3d support) but not well
